snippet: The Library of Congress will announce on Monday that Natasha Trethewey is to be appointed to a second one-year term as the United States poet laureate.
abstract: Library of Congress plans to announce that Natasha Trethewey is to be appointed to a second one-year term as the United States poet laureate.
lead_paragraph: The Library of Congress will announce on Monday that Natasha Trethewey is to be appointed to a second one-year term as the United States poet laureate.

headline.print_headline: Poet Laureate  For a Second Time
headline.main: Poet Laureate  for a Second Time
